author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Make option for registering the EM parametrization process and add a region for NoSD option. These are useful for Geant4/GeantV comparisons

#### PR validation:

Tested with standard run flow matrix

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-sim44 Make changes to conform G4/GV Comparison
